media.headline: Nava's solo homer
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Nava belts first home run with the Phillies
media.bigblurb: Daniel Nava opens the scoring with a solo blast over the right-field wall in the 1st, notching his first homer as a member of the Phillies

media.headline: Buchholz's first K with Phillies
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Buchholz fans Duvall for first Phillies' K
media.bigblurb: Clay Buchholz freezes Adam Duvall on a called strike three, notching the first strikeout of the 2017 season and his first with the Phillies

media.headline: Cozart's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Cozart plates Suarez on a sacrifice fly
media.bigblurb: Zack Cozart lofts a fly ball to center field deep enough to score Eugenio Suarez on the sacrifice fly, tying the game at 1 in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Nava's two-run homer
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Nava crushes his second home run of the game
media.bigblurb: Daniel Nava smacks a two-run home run to right-center field, tallying his second homer of the game to give the Phillies a 3-1 lead

media.headline: Davis' parents on his debut
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Davis' parents talk about Rookie's Debut
media.bigblurb: Rookie Davis' parents give their thoughts on watching their son make his Major League debut against the Phillies

media.headline: Knapp, Stassi's dads on debuts
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Knapp and Stassi's fathers on son's debuts
media.bigblurb: Mike Knapp and Jim Stassi, fathers of Andrew Knapp and Brock Stassi, talk about watching their sons make their Major League debuts

media.headline: Suarez's ground-rule double
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Suarez hits a ground-rule double in the 2nd
media.bigblurb: Eugenio Suarez hits a deep fly ball that one-hops over the right-field wall for a ground-rule double to lead off the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Davis' first Major League hit
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Davis doubles for his first Major League hit
media.bigblurb: Rookie Davis tallies the first hit of his Major League career in his first at-bat, doubling off the left-field wall in the 3rd inning

media.headline: Stassi starts DP, escapes jam
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Stassi starts 3-6 double play to escape jam
media.bigblurb: With two runners on, Brock Stassi makes a great stop to start a 3-6 double play before Rookie Davis could score, escaping the 3rd unscathed

media.headline: Cozart's RBI single
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Cozart plates Duvall with a single to left
media.bigblurb: Zack Cozart singles to left field, scoring Adam Duvall to cut the Reds' deficit to 4-2 in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Lorenzen's pinch-hit solo homer
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Pitcher Lorenzen hits a pinch-hit solo smash
media.bigblurb: Relief pitcher Michael Lorenzen comes off the bench to hammer a solo home run in the bottom of the 6th, giving the Reds a 5-4 lead

media.headline: Turner's family on his debut
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Turner's family discusses Stuart's MLB debut
media.bigblurb: The Turner family gives their thoughts on Stuart Turner's Major League debut against the Phillies

media.headline: Duvall's two-run homer
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Duvall extends the lead with a two-run shot
media.bigblurb: Adam Duvall golfs one deep over the left-field wall for a two-run home run, extending the Reds' lead to 7-4 in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Nava nabs Cozart at third
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Nava throws out Cozart at third base
media.bigblurb: Daniel Nava fields Billy Hamilton's line drive in left field and fires to third base to nab Zack Cozart on the force play in the 8th inning

media.headline: Statcast: Lorenzen launches one
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Pitcher Lorenzen launches a pinch-hit homer
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures the exit velocity, launch angle and projected distance of Michael Lorenzen's pinch-hit home run against the Phillies

media.headline: Storen notches the save
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Storen locks down his first save of 2017
media.bigblurb: Drew Storen gets Tommy Joseph to ground out to second base, notching his first save of the season in the Reds' 7-4 win over the Phillies

media.headline: Reed induces DP, escapes jam
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Reed gets DP to escape trouble in the 5th
media.bigblurb: With two runners on, Cody Reed gets Michael Saunders to ground into a 4-6-3 double play, escaping trouble in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Kivlehan's first hit as a Red
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Kivlehan gets his first hit with the Reds
media.bigblurb: Patrick Kivlehan singles to right field, registering his first hit as a member of the Reds

media.headline: Herrera scores on a wild pitch
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Herrera races home on a wild pitch
media.bigblurb: Odubel Herrera alertly races home on Rookie Davis' wild pitch, scoring to give the Phillies a 4-1 advantage in the 3rd inning

media.headline: Gennett's RBI groundout
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Gennett drives in Schebler on a groundout
media.bigblurb: Scooter Gennett grounds out to first base, scoring Scott Schebler to tie the game at 4 in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Turner picks off Knapp
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Turner picks off Knapp at second base
media.bigblurb: Stuart Turner catches Andrew Knapp leading too far off of second base and picks him off for the first out of the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Davis' first MLB strikeout
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Davis K's Hernandez for first MLB strikeout
media.bigblurb: Rookie Davis strikes out Cesar Hernandez swinging for the first out of the game, notching his first strikeout of his Major League career

media.headline: Turner's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Turner drives in Suarez with a sacrifice fly
media.bigblurb: Stuart Turner collects the first RBI of his Major League career when his sacrifice fly scores Eugenio Suarez to cut the gap to 4-3

media.headline: Hernandez's leaping catch
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Hernandez makes leaping grab to rob Hamilton
media.bigblurb: Cesar Hernandez races back on Billy Hamilton's soft liner and times his leap to make the catch, stranding a runner at third to end the 4th

media.headline: Nava's two-homer game
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Nava tallies two home runs against the Reds
media.bigblurb: Daniel Nava belts a solo home run in the 1st inning and hammers a two-run smash in the 3rd inning against the Reds

media.headline: Recap: PHI 4, CIN 7
media.blurb: 4/6/17: Reds score six unanswered in 7-4 victory
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: The Reds scored six unanswered runs, aided by Michael Lorenzen's pinch-hit homer, as Cody Reed notched his first career win

media.headline: Must C: Lorenzen goes yard
media.blurb: Must C Crushed: Lorenzen slugs 420-ft pinch-hit homer
media.bigblurb: Pitcher Michael Lorenzen comes off the bench and hammers a pinch-hit home run to center field, giving the Reds a 5-4 lead

media.headline: Lorenzen on his clutch homer
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Lorenzen on his pinch-hit home run
media.bigblurb: Michael Lorenzen talks about his pinch-hit solo home run in the 6th inning that broke a 4-4 tie as the Reds topped the Phillies, 7-4

media.headline: Davis on his Major League debut
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Davis goes three innings in MLB debut
media.bigblurb: Rookie Davis evaluates his first Major League start in which he gave up four runs in three innings in the Reds' 7-4 win over the Phillies

media.headline: 4/6/17 CG: PHI@CIN
media.blurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: PHI@CIN
media.bigblurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: PHI@CIN

media.headline: Duvall on his two-run homer
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Duvall on his key two-run blast in the 7th
media.bigblurb: Adam Duvall talks about his preparation for games and coming up big with a two-run homer in the Reds' 7-4 win over the Phillies
